Malachi or Malachias__04.6__He shall turn the heart: : By bringing over the Jews to the faith of Christ, he shall reconcile them to their fathers, viz., the partiarchs and prophets; whose hearts for many ages have been turned away from them, because of their refusing to believe in Christ.-- Ibid.
Malachi or Malachias__04.6__With anathema: : In the Hebrew, Cherem, that is, with utter destruction.
